name: Morning Lion Feeding
description: Watch the zookeepers feed the lions their breakfast.

name: Penguin Parade
description: See the penguins march around their enclosure.

name: Elephant Bath Time
description: Watch the elephants get a bath and play in the water.

name: Giraffe Feeding Experience
description: Feed the giraffes from the raised platform.

name: Grizzly Bear Catch
description: Observe the grizzly bears demonstrating their fishing skills.

name: Polar Bear Plunge
description: Watch the polar bears dive and swim in their icy pool.

name: Walrus Whistle
description: A fun training session where walruses show off their sounds.

name: Antelope Sprint
description: Witness the incredible speed of the antelopes across the plains.

name: Early Bird Lion Watch
description: A quiet observation session of the lions as the zoo opens.

name: Afternoon Elephant Snack
description: Watch the elephants enjoy their afternoon treats.
